title: Bug 5473ShiftLeft behavior with intermixed tabs and spaces
description: Bug 5473ShiftLeft behavior with intermixed tabs and spaces Build 200110251.
OB: When executing the ShiftLeft command on lines that contain intermixed tabs and spaces, nothing moves.
EB: The expected behavior is that executing the ShiftLeft command on lines with intermixed tabs and spaces should properly shift the lines to the left.
SR:
To reproduce the issue: 
1. Open a default text editor.
2. Type in the following lines: <space<tabsome text<tabsome text2.
3. Highlight the two lines above.
4. Execute the ShiftLeft command.
5. Notice that nothing moves.
